content:
Are there any Implementation Guides around sending a ServiceRequest to a third party provider? e.g.,
I have a patient that requests a lab kit from a third party, or requests anything from a third party platform.. looking for any IGs surrounding that.

There is some guidance about alternatives in the workflow section of the spec. I know there's a messaging-based IG in Canada for doing referral service requests. I'm not sure if there's one internationally or not.

There's the DME (durable medical equipment) orders IG, which sound similar to your needs:
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/dme-orders/2020Sep/
Thanks to both, I'll take a look
